text:
ASSESSING THE EFFECTIVENESS OF AFRICAN BASIL (OCIMUM
GRATISSIMUM) IN CONTROLLING GLOW WORMS (LAMPYRIDAE
NOTILUCA) IN MALAKWANG (HIBISCUS SPP)

MOSES DRILIGA
J22B26/030

A DISSERTATION SUBMITTED TO THE FACULTY OF AGRICULTURAL SCIENCES IN
PARTIAL FULFILLMENT FOR THE REQUIREMENTS FOR THE AWARD OF A DEGREE OF
BACHELOR OF AGRICULTURAL SCIENCE AND ENTREPRENEURSHIP OF UGANDA
CHRISTIAN UNIVERSITY
April, 2025
